message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it has the potential to be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm offering it at $1,400,000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1,400,000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,350,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to come down slightly, but I believe the fair value of this product is closer to $1,380,000. It offers significant potential for your business.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,360,000.
